description: The convict Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Russia. Once a notorious space pirate, Argo is now a prisoner of Neo Russia, forced to fight in the tournament to win the release of his captive men. His masters - well aware of Argo`s courage and immense physical strength - keep the towering Gundam Fighter in shackles, with a bomb strapped to his chest just in case he disobeys their orders. Argo is a man of few words, a silent giant who knows no mercy and no fear.
name: Argo Gulskii
